message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's in great condition and worth a lot more than that! Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $85 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. How about we split the difference at $90?  I'm confident you'll find this product is worth every penny.
